title: Multi-region AppSync to EventBridge
description: Create an AppSync API with EventBridge as HTTP data source and replicate to a secondary region, enabling bi-directional data flow between clients in different regions via serverless WebSockets.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This project contains CDK templates for deploying two Amazon EventBridge event buses as a HTTP data sources for related AWS AppSync APIs in two regions, enabling bi-directional event data flow between clients in different regions via serverless WebSockets.

bullets.text: Implement Multi-Region Serverless (and Functionless) WebSocket Pub/Sub APIs with AWS AppSync and Amazon EventBridge
